USE nyc_taxi_ldw;
GO

-- Data dictionary reference: https://www.nyc.gov/assets/tlc/downloads/pdf/data_dictionary_trip_records_green.pdf

SELECT
    td.year,
    td.month,
    tz.borough,
    CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date,
    cal.day_name AS trip_day,
    CASE WHEN cal.day_name IN ('Saturday', 'Sunday') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS trip_day_weekend_ind,
    SUM(CASE WHEN td.trip_type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS street_hail_trip_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN td.trip_type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dispatch_trip_count
FROM
    silver.vw_trip_data_green td
    JOIN silver.calendar cal ON (CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime) = cal.date)
    JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz ON (td.pu_location_id = tz.location_id)
WHERE
    td.year = '2020' AND td.month = '01'
GROUP BY
    td.year,
    td.month,
    tz.borough,
    CONVERT(DATE, td.lpep_pickup_datetime),
    cal.day_name;
